Stepping Stones Community Resources, Inc.

Substance Abuse & Mental Health Treatment in Wilson, NC

Confidential, compassionate care for people facing addiction, stress, anxiety, depression, and life challenges. We offer outpatient counseling, intensive programs, DWI services, case management, and primary care—support built around you.

Call Now Request an Appointment

Confidential care • Respectful support • You are not alone

No referral required. We’ll help you understand your options and the next steps.

Services designed for recovery and wellness

Explore care options built around your needs, with clear next steps and supportive guidance.

Individual Outpatient Therapy

Personalized therapy to help you manage stress, mood, behavior, and life challenges—one step at a time.

Learn about Individual Outpatient Therapy

Substance Abuse Counseling Outpatient Treatment (SACOT)

Supportive outpatient counseling focused on recovery skills, stability, and long-term change.

Learn about Substance Abuse Counseling (SACOT)

Substance Abuse Intensive Outpatient Program (SAIOP)

A structured program with more support and accountability—designed to strengthen recovery.

Learn about Intensive Outpatient (SAIOP)

Case Management

Guidance connecting you to services, resources, and practical support to stay on track.

Learn about Case Management

Primary Care

Whole-person wellness through primary care services that support your overall health.

Learn about Primary Care

DWI Services

Assessments and services to help you meet requirements and move forward with confidence.

Learn about DWI Services

What happens when you call

We keep it simple and reassuring so you know what to expect.

Listen

Tell us what’s going on. We’ll answer immediate questions with respect and care.

We explain options

We’ll review next steps and share which services may be the best fit for you.

We schedule (if you choose)

If you want to move forward, we’ll schedule an appointment that works for you.

No referral required.

Frequently asked questions

What services does Stepping Stones Community Resources provide?

We provide outpatient mental health therapy, substance abuse counseling, intensive outpatient treatment, case management, DWI services, and integrated primary care. All services are delivered with confidentiality and individualized care.

Who can receive services at Stepping Stones?

We serve adolescents, adults, men, and women seeking help with substance use, mental health challenges, behavioral concerns, or DWI-related requirements.

Do I need a referral to start treatment?

No referral is required. You can call us directly to speak with our team and schedule an assessment.

What happens when I call?

We listen to your needs, answer your questions, explain treatment options, and schedule your first appointment if you choose to move forward.

Is treatment confidential?

Yes. All services are provided in a confidential and respectful environment following professional privacy standards.

Information Concerning Alcohol and Driving While Impaired

There are five levels of misdemeanor Driving While Intoxicated. Level I is the most serious and Level V the least.
